pages.text: This may be my last entry in this journal. They have found out about what I am doing. But! I have a plan, to send them all to oblivion, turn them all into my test subects for further research. I sent my arm into the 'soulspace' with an experimental sigil, so I simply need to improve it. It should be as simple as scaling it up, but I won't have a chance to test beforehand.

I simply need to channel the sigil for a short time, and I should be theoretically able to send them all into soulspace with one fell swoop. I wish I had more time to test it, but I just heard my door give way. They are inside, I hear footsteps coming down the stairs...$(br)$(4)I pray to the gods that luck be on my side.
